title: Google Keep
description: Meta Platforms, Inc. develops innovative and widely-used applications designed to connect people and enhance communication globally. Their apps include Instagram, enabling users to share photos, videos, and stories with friends and followers; WhatsApp Messenger, offering fast messaging, voice, and video calls with multimedia sharing capabilities; Facebook, a social networking platform to connect with friends, family, and communities; and WhatsApp Business, designed to help businesses communicate efficiently with customers.
